dcterms:creator: Z. Chen

dcterms:description: A new dataset consisting of continuous recordings of concatenated LibriSpeech utterances obtained by multiple different devices, designed for evaluation of ad hoc array-based speech separation and multi-talker speech recognition algorithms under acoustically realistic conditions.
dcterms:title: AdHoc-LibriCSS

dcterms:creator: V. Panayotov
G. Chen
D. Povey
S. Khudanpur
dcterms:description: An ASR corpus based on public domain audio books, used for training and evaluating automatic speech recognition systems.
dcterms:title: LibriSpeech

dcterms:creator: Z. Chen
T. Yoshioka
L. Lu
T. Zhou
Z. Meng
Y. Luo
J. Wu
J. Li
dcterms:description: A dataset for continuous speech separation, providing recordings for training and evaluation of speech separation systems.
dcterms:title: LibriCSS
